game.name: LOCKDOWN Protocol
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A first person social deduction game, combining real time action and communication, playable up to 16 players. While most players will cooperate to complete objectives to ensure victory, a small portion of dissidents will try their best to stop them at all cost, without being caught.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A first person social deduction game, combining real time action and communication, playable up to 16 players. While most players will cooperate to complete objectives to ensure victory, a small portion of dissidents will try their best to stop them at all cost, without being caught.

reviewHighlights.text: 미션 공부안하고하면 시민이 못이김 튜로리얼 잘보고 하세요 공식한글패치 있음 좋겠따
착한 사람이든 나쁜 사람이든 칼을 쥐어주면 위험 해진다는 걸 알 수 있는 게임 물론 칼보다 총이 더 강하니 괜히 깝치지 말도록
